name: FireBase_Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot or environment is invalid -- @1.1

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends POST request to initiate a scan with chatbot "70ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b1c" and environment "aae0a1b6-fafe-40af-ab20-87934343521f"
When FireBase_the user receives the scan initiation response
Then FireBase_the status code returned should be 404 for not found error
And FireBase_the response should contain an error message "Not Found"

And FireBase_the message should contain "Provided Chatbot 70ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b1c not found in Environment aae0a1b6-fafe-40af-ab20-87934343521f.Both chatbot and environment should exist and chatbot should be assigned to the environment."

fullName: FireBase_Initiate Scan using Genr3d API: FireBase_Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot or environment is invalid
